Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Instruction

  • public class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents an instruction
    Author:
    Cameron Zurmuhl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String buildBType()
      Method buildBType builds hex code for B-type instruction Instruction type size: 16 bit opcode, 16 bit BR address
      java.lang.String buildCBType()
      Method buildBType builds hex code for CB-type instruction Instruction size: 12 bit opcode, 4 bit Rt, 16 bit Cond_BR_Address
      java.lang.String buildDType()
      Method buildDType builds hex code for D-type instruction Instruction size: 12 bit opcode, 12 bit DT_address, 4 bit Rn, 4 bit Rt
      java.lang.String buildIType()
      Method buildIType builds hex code for I-type instruction Instruction type size: 16 bit opcode, 8 bit immediate, 4 bit Rn, 4 bit Rd
      java.lang.String buildRType()
      Method buildRType builds hex code for a R-type instruction Instruction type size: 16 bit opcode, 4 bit Rm, 4 bit shamt, 4 bit Rn, 4 bit Rd
      java.lang.String buildSpecial()
      Method buildSpecial builds hex code for speical instructions halt and nop Instruction type: 32 bit opcode
      java.lang.String buildStack()
      Method buildStack builds hex code for stack operations push and pop Instruction type size: 16 bit opcode, 16 bit Rd
      int getAddress()
      Method getAddress returns the address of the instruction
      Argument getArgument(int index)
      Method getArgument returns an argument at an index
      java.lang.String getOperator()
      Method getOperator returns this.operator
      java.lang.String getType()
      method getType() returns this intruction's type (R, D, I...)
      java.lang.String moveZ(java.lang.String rd, int data)
      Method moveZ handles the moveZ instruction (converts to a hex instruction) Size of instruction is 12 bit opcode 4 bit rd 16 bit address
      void printInstruction()
      Method printInstruction prints the Argument and its operator
      void setArguments(Argument[] args)
      Method setArguments sets this.Arguments
      void setOperator(java.lang.String op)
      Method setOperator sets this.operator

      • moveZ

        public java.lang.String moveZ(java.lang.String rd,
                              int data)
        Method moveZ handles the moveZ instruction (converts to a hex instruction) Size of instruction is 12 bit opcode 4 bit rd 16 bit address
        Parameters:
        rd - the register to load data to
        address - the address of the data
        Returns:
        the instruction for moveZ in hex
